title: Medford Acupuncture and Chiropractic Center - Massage Medford
description: FREE initial consultation, 15-minute massages with each chiropractic appointment, military discounts. Massage therapy, acupuncture. Call 609-654-2420.
cleaned_text: Relax your body and help your muscles and bones heal. Medford Acupuncture and Chiropractic Center utilizes a variety of techniques to restore motion and comfort to your body. Your first consultation with us will be FREE of cost. We also offer military discounts. Ask our staff to learn more. Each chiropractic appointment you take includes a 15-minute massage!
